name: Snake on Six Planes (aka Zombie Conga)
name_original: Snake on Six Planes (aka Zombie Conga)
description:
Do you like getting chased by zombies, saving (or eating?) other survivors and picking up supplies while you make your way through a desolate wasteland of death and destruction? We do too! So here is a Zombie inspired version of the classic game, Snake, on a cube, 6 planes, can you believe that?! Using WSAD or the D-PAD (on an XBOX 360 controller) to guide your hero, flee the zombies for as long as you can, get all the loot and save other survivors. But you know, in the end it's pointless, and they will get you.. but that's ok, we love zombies. See you on the other side...

*queue willhelm scream*


tl;dr

  • Use WSAD on keyboard or the DPAD on controller to move your hero around the surface of the cube.
  • Collect crates and other survivors for 'points'.
  • The game gets faster with every additional zombie chasing you, so collect those crates and save those survivors as fast as possible!
  • Share screenshots of your high scores with friends!

Updates

May 3rd, 2014

  • Re-enabled controller support. Remember, use the D-PAD, not the analog sticks. Also note that the keyboard controls won't work if a controller has been detected :(
  • Added local highscores! You can now show off your expert Zombie Conga skills to all your friends!
